list_definition.definition: something given willingly, eg as a present

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She has a gift for music.

list_definition.definition: to give or present as a gift

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: This painting was gifted by our former chairman.

We swap small gifts, we go out together.

In contrast, one-off financial gifts to grandchildren were common and by far the most frequent type of private financial transfer.
